source.title: An internal model for sensorimotor integration

confidence_rationale: Strong support for explicit predicted-vs-observed consequence comparison after action, which matches REE post-commit attribution routing; the paper does not define a discrete commit token, so support is mechanistic but indirect.

mapping.source_claim_statement: Action control relies on internal forward models that predict sensory consequences and compare them to actual feedback.

mapping.mapping_caveat: No explicit boundary token or multi-module TTL contract is proposed in the source.
